snippet.title: The Last Letter - VR game trailer
snippet.description:
The Last Letter is a VR Narrative Puzzle Game.
An enigmatic letter of your girlfriend’s Grandma accompanying an antique board game will lead you to the discovery of a mysterious and fantastic new world.
